name: hant
description: Tools primary for console applications (sys platforms: neko/php/cpp).
releasenote:
CmdOptions: repeatable values bugfix.
Support `-D hant-no-ndll` for ensure work without hant.ndll.
Command `path` now can accept *.fdproj.
Add `compiler-options` command to getting haxe compiler options from *.fdproj
No additinal haxe compiler options by default.
Add `FileSystemTools.removeEmptyDirectories()`.
